root.name: Football Genius - The Ultimate Quiz
root.description: A trivia game about football (soccer in Americanish). 3500 questions about international, english, spanish, german, french and italian football. You choose to play either off or online, and you can play a half or a full game. When playing against human opponents instead of the A.I, more gamemodes are playable. In most of the gamemodes you have multiple choice answers. A timer counts down whenever a question is asked, rewarding you with more points for a fast answer. On the other hand, you'll loose more points if you get your answer wrong and fast.
